input.sentences: the family held a masquerade ball for halloween .
the two sisters came with colorful masks .
all family and friends were invited .
the party was lively with drinks served .
the father came dressed as a pirate and enjoyed dancing with the ladies .
output.sentences: There was a masquerade held for Halloween.
There were masks on two sisters that were very colorful.
The party was very lively and served its purpose.
The pirate loved the ladies and was my friend's father.
